Desc.entry: Irish cultural organisation. Performs at a number of functions in Sheffield for charity and concerts for various groups by request such as Help the Aged, church groups etc. Takes part in the Sheffield Irish Festival annually in March. Provides music for the Irish Elders lunch clubs. The Irish Yorkies/Shamrock Band, a ceilidh and concert group is available for barn dances, concert, parties, weddings and wakes (see separate entry). A piper, playing Irish Pipes and Scots War Pipes, is available for cultural events, funerals or civic events.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon at 8.30pm, an open session in which anyone can join
